summary: Frontend testing of CapCut-style compact Timeline (200px height) - All 12 requested features verified and working. Timeline displays at bottom with compact 200px height, Time Ruler with tick marks, Timeline Toolbar (Undo, Redo, Split, Delete, Snap), Transport controls (Play/Pause/Stop), +Video/+Audio buttons, Track labels (120px column), red Playhead, Zoom controls, Hint bar with keyboard shortcuts, and Timecode display. Interactive tests confirmed: adding video/audio tracks works, snap toggle changes state, play/pause works, zoom controls work.

ui_bugs.issue: Zoom value shows 'NaN' briefly after clicking zoom buttons - React warning about NaN in children
